_header: Saint Bartholomew the holy man of kings blood
Subjects: saints’ lives; Bartholomew, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Bartholomew in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Berthelmeu þe apostel com of kynges blodeSinþe uair
                    man & noble he was of glad & suete mode…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝerne seynt berthelmeu þat hei apostel
                    isþat þe raþer þoru is bone come to heuene
                    blis

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint bartulmew þe apostil com of kinges blodeswyþe fayr
                    & noble man he was glad & swete of mode…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now idde we ȝerne seint bartilmeuȝ þat hy apostele
                    isþat we þe sonnere for his loue come to heuene blis

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Bartholomeuȝ þe holi mon com of kynges
                    blodeSwiþe feir mon and noble he was and glad and of feir
                    mode…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝeorne seint Bertholomeuȝ þat
                    heiȝ apostel isÞat we þe sannore þorwh his bone come to
                    heuene blis. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Bartelnev þe holie man cam of kingues blodeSwyþe
                    fair man and noble he was and glad & of swete mode…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Bidde we nouþe Seint Barthelmevȝ þat heiȝ
                    Apostle isÞat we moten þoruȝ his loue come to heouene
                    blis
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 366-76.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Bartholomeu þapostle Com of kinges blodSuyþe fair
                    man he was And of glad mod…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝerne seint berthelm þat hey apostle
                    isþat we mot þe sauuere þorw his bone Come to heuene
                    blisse
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein nartelmeu þe apostel com of kinges blodeSwiþe nair
                    man and noble he was of glade & swete mode…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝeorne sein bartelmeu þat hei apostel
                    isÞat we þe watloker þoru is born come to heuene
                    blis

D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Bartholomew þe Apostel com of kynges blodSwiþe
                    ffayr man and noble he was euere glad & of ffayr mod…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝeorne Seint Bartholomew þat hey Apostel
                    isÞat we þe raþer þorw his bone come mowe to heuene
                    blis

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint bartholome þe apostel come of kyngis blodeSwyþe
                    faire man he was & of swete mode…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now bydde we seint bartholome þat hey apostel ysþat
                    we þe raþer þorwe hym come to heuene blysse

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt bartholomeu þe holy mon com of kynges blodSwiþe
                    noble mon he was of glad & swete mode…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we to saynt bartholomeu þat hegh apostle
                    isÞat we mot þurȝ his bone come to heuen blis
                    Amen

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Bartelmew þe apostil be come of kynges blodeffull fayre man
                    & nobyll enogh & wondere mylde of mode…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…god gyf vs grace þat we maycome to þat Ioy þat
                    lastes ay

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Bartelmow þe apostel come of kynggis bloodFul noble man
                    and faire he was glad & swete of mood…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Nowe prey we ȝerne seint Bartelmewe þat hie apostel
                    isÞat we mote þorowe his loue come to heuene blis.
                    Amen
